scripts.deploy-local: source .env.production_deploy . && source .env.production . && npm run clean && serverless config credentials --provider aws --key $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --secret $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -n backendProdProfile -o && NODE_ENV=production serverless deploy --aws-profile backendProdProfile
scripts.deploy-template-en: source .env.production_template_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile templateBackendProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile templateBackendProfile && aws ses create-template --cli-input-json file://./src/assets/reminderEmailTemplate.json --profile templateBackendProfile --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy-template-es: source .env.production_template_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile templateBackendProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile templateBackendProfile && aws ses create-template --cli-input-json file://./src/assets/reminderEmailTemplate_Spanish.json --profile templateBackendProfile --region us-east-1
scripts.update-template-en: source .env.production_template_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile templateBackendProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile templateBackendProfile && aws ses update-template --cli-input-json file://./src/assets/reminderEmailTemplate.json --profile templateBackendProfile --region us-east-1
scripts.update-template-es: source .env.production_template_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile templateBackendProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile templateBackendProfile && aws ses update-template --cli-input-json file://./src/assets/reminderEmailTemplate_Spanish.json --profile templateBackendProfile --region us-east-1
